Package support

Class Summary
AvailableColorsModel I am a class that store the model of the Available color, aka the right column of the interface.
ChosenColorsModel I am a class that store the model of the Chosen colors, aka the middle column of the interface.
ClipBoardComponent I am a class that is used for the copy paste action in the interface.
COColorChooser I am the Panel that contain the model of the color chooser.
COCopyKeyListener I am a listener for the crtl-c command.
COCopyMenuActionListener I am a Listener for the selected element in the columns.
COCopyPopupMenuListener I am a Listener for the element in the contextual menu.
COFocusListener I am a class that display the focus of elements by displaying a blue rectangle around them.
COMouseFocusListener I am a class that request the focus of an element on click.
COPasteKeyListener I am a listener for the crtl-v command.
COPasteMenuActionListener I am a Listener for the selected element in the columns.
COPastePopupMenuListener I am a Listener for the element in the contextual menu.
DraggableDualComponent I am a class that wrap the DualColorComponent to make it draggable.
DropTargetListener I am a listener that drop the dragged element onto the dropTarget.
DualColorComponent I am a class that contain two panel.
